text:
e="preserve">Sheldon S. Cohen (June 28, 1927 – September 4, 2018) was an American attorney. He was the Commissioner of Internal Revenue from 1965 to 1969 during the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. He was born in Washington, D.C..
Cohen died of heart failure on September 4, 2018, in Chevy Chase, Maryland at age 91.
